name: Unholey Tithes
description:
Unholey Tithes -

Main Objective - Defeat the monster currently climbing out of the hole in the center of the map.

Controls -
    WASD to move.
    Mouse to aim.
    Left Click to shoot.
    E to interact.
    Esc to stop.

How To Play -
    Gather Resources - Your current resource count can be found in the top left. Various items around the map will give you resources when interacted with,
    adding to your currently carried amount. Be sure to check things like cars, drawers, wardrobes, and even the trees. If you can't seem to get some resources try making new gear such as gloves!
    
    Craft Better Gear - At the workbench (Found in the building to your left when you start) you can use resources to craft better gear that lets you carry
    more resources or better weapons to fight the monster.
    
    Tithe at the Hole - Throwing resources down the hole effects the monster in different ways, it may have lower hp or even be slow to move if you throw
    enough things at it.
    
Notes -
    The game will close when you defeat the monster.
    The game will restart if the monster defeats you.

Credits -

Code - Lance5057

Art - snurlsss
